references: Related: CF 193963, CF 194270, CF 194137, CF 194220. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of a portion of the north one-half of the southeast one-quarter of the northwest one-quarter of unplatted property in Section 25, Township 24 North, Range 3 East, W. M.; Tract 7 and the west one-half of Tract 6, Commissioner of Public Lands Subdivision of Section 3, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M.; north one-half of Lot 2, Block 3; Ashford's Addition; and Lots 24 and 25, Block 4, Edgewater Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-203 and 17-150, respectively.
